files-question4_key1: Iss text ko `question3.txt` ke naam ki `file` mein `save` karo.
files-question4_key2: Iss `file` mein dhyaan se dekhoge toh ek insaan ka naam aur ek sheher ka naam milegaYeh sheher woh sheher hai jisme woh insaaan rehta hai. Ab aapne ek aisa `code` likhna hai jo:
files-question4_key3: Delhi mein rehne waale logon ko ek alag `file` mein daale. Delhi waali `file` ka naam "delhi.txt" hona chaiye.
files-question4_key4: Shimla mein rehne waale logon ko ek alag `file` mein daale. Shimla waali `file` na naam "shimla.txt" hona chaiye
files-question4_key5: Aur saare log jo delhi aur shimla mein nahi rehte, unko ek alag `file` mein daale. Iss `file` ka naam "others.txt" hona chaiye
files-question4_key6: **Aapko aisa `code` likhna hai, jo aisi `file` mein kitni bhi lines pe chal paye.**
